text: Margot Sofie Walle (11 November 1921 - 26 February 1990) was a Norwegian pair skater. She competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics, where she placed 10th with partner Allan Fjeldheim. She was Norwegian pairs champion in 1946, 1947, 1948 and 1949. ==Results== (with Allan Fjeldheim) {| class="wikitable" |- !
